text: Pseudocolaspis chrysites is a species of leaf beetle. It is distributed in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Yemen, Ethiopia, Tanzania and Mozambique. It was described by the German entomologist Carl Eduard Adolph Gerstaecker in 1871. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Insects of Ethiopia Category:Insects of Tanzania Category:Insects of Mozambique Category:Beetles described in 1871 Category:Taxa named by Carl Eduard Adolph Gerstaecker
title: Pseudocolaspis chrysites
